'''GENSHIN CONCERT 2023 "Melodies of an Endless Journey" Scenic Vistas''' is a collection of pre-recorded performances jointly organized by Genshin Impact, the HOYO-MiX team and various other musicians.

The online concert uses XR and AR technology to reinterpret well-known melodies that all Travelers are familiar with but with a completely new audiovisual experience.

Melodies of an Endless Journey will resound once more and we invite all Travelers to immerse themselves in the beauty of Genshin Impact's music.
